title: The Detroit Trendwings 3/23: National Puppy Day, John Oliver, Allen Iverson, Shrimp Tails, Memes
itunes:title: The Detroit Trendwings 3/23: National Puppy Day, John Oliver, Allen Iverson, Shrimp Tails, Memes
description:
On this edition of The Detroit Trendwings Jack and Miles discuss that today is National Puppy day, John Oliver exposes Meghan McCain's 'Stop Asian Hate' hypocrisy, whether Allen Iverson > Kyrie Irving, Man finds shrimp tails in his Cinnamon Toast Crunch, and a new meme format is popping.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
